channel.title: Arrow Error
channel.description:
Ok so i have a bit of a problem when i try to use a bow and have no arrows it kicks me and says this
[code][mat]: Logged in. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at Client.AttackNPC(Client.java:9618) at Client.process(Client.java:850) at PlayerManager.process(PlayerManager.java:118) at Server.main(Server.java:40)[/code]
but if i use arrows its fine

item.title: Arrow Error
item.dc:creator: @mathew000000000 mathew000000000
item.description:
